dict.string: You are a part of the intrepid crew of a ship committed to exploring the far reaches of space and beyond. You help the ship by completing your daily to-dos and building productive habits for yourself. It may not be as exciting as shooting lasers and pushing buttons on holo-screens but it's just as important because if you don't complete your to-dos, the ship falls apart and when the ship falls apart, it's vulnerable to attack and when the ship gets attacked, it gets blown up, and when the ship blows up, people die. Don't be the reason people die. Complete your spacedamned to-dos!
